belnetb: ip -6 rule add from fd00:200:3::/48 to fd00:200:3::/48 pref 1000 table main
ip -6 rule add from fd00:200:3::/48 to fd00:300:3::/48 pref 1000 table main
ip -6 route add ::/0 via fd00:200:3::2 dev HALL-eth1 metric 1 table lb
ip -6 rule add from fd00:200:3::/48 pref 2000 table lb

load_balancing: ip -6 rule add from fd00:300:3::/48 to fd00:300:3::/48 pref 1000 table main
ip -6 rule add from fd00:300:3::/48 to fd00:200:3::/48 pref 1000 table main
ip -6 route add ::/0 via fd00:300:3::1 dev Pyth-eth0 metric 1 table lb
ip -6 rule add from fd00:300:3::/48 pref 2000 table lb
